info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:50PM EDT until August 29 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR WAYNE...OAKLAND AND MACOMB COUNTIES... At 550 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Metamora to near West Bloomfield to Ypsilanti, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Pontiac and Birmingham around 600 PM EDT. Canton around 605 PM EDT. Troy, Romulus and Rochester around 610 PM EDT. Taylor, Sterling Heights, Clinton and Greenfield Village around 615 PM EDT. Romeo, Dearborn, Wyandotte and Macomb Township around 620 PM EDT. Downtown Detroit, Detroit and Armada around 625 PM EDT. New Baltimore, Richmond and Grosse Pointe around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Melvindale, Gibraltar, Waterford, Shelby Township, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Ray Center and Utica. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
